selected_skills.name: identify_spatial_relationships
selected_skills.purpose: To identify the spatial relationship between the small yellow aeroplane and the gray rubber objects in front of it.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine which objects are in front of the small yellow aeroplane by analyzing the spatial relationships in the diagram.

selected_skills.name: count_objects
selected_skills.purpose: To count the number of gray rubber objects and big cyan matte fighters in the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to count the specific objects identified in the diagram based on their attributes.

new_skill_specs.name: compare_object_counts
new_skill_specs.purpose: To compare two counts and determine which is greater.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A string indicating which count is greater or if they are equal.
edge_cases: One or both counts are zero
